Package com.developersboard.backend.service.user.impl

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.developersboard.backend.service.user.impl.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service @Transactional(readOnly=true) public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
The UserServiceImpl class provides implementation for the UserService definitions.
Since:
1.0
